ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Reborn
ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry to see you go Teltoli.  Hey, I was wondering if I could get Teltoli and Kit as my characters?) The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Koga

(Sorry to see you go Teltoli.  Hey, I was wondering if I could get Teltoli 
and Kit as my characters?)

The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis/Unitron:


Inside the downed Predacon ship (Set and Shuko's), Unitron finished setting 
defenses and other counter measures up, heading into the CR room and getting 
into a chamber.
----------
As Unitron got in his CR chamber, Anubis and Hades got of theirs (seperate CR 
chambers for them).  
Stretching, Anubis spoke.  "Slag, I feel so much better!  Let's get to the 
bridge." he said, walking out of the room, followed by Hades.
---------
Koga Shuko, getting out of his private CR chamber, entered the lab.  He could 
see in the device he had put Serpentor's fang in, a scaly pair of 
yellow/green legs and a pelvis had appeared.  Checking the device, he found a 
small screen that read: "45%".  Ah, this should only take another 25 cycles 
or so, then we will meet this fellow, head on!"

Recieving the Truth's com transmission, replies to them.  "Come to these 
coordinates, 14.23, 234 Alpha.  You will recieve 30 energon cubes (150 LBS 
AKA 68 Kilos)

==============

Nemesis Enforcer awoke, having dozed off for a few dozen cycles.  Looking up, 
he saw the Oblitercons getting out of their CR chambers.  Smiling, he stood, 
kicking Scattershot awake, who stood up next to him.  With a smile, Nemesis 
Enforcer looked to the Oblitercons.  "What the slag t-" Nemesis was cut off, 
a right hook from Breakdown, Scavenger uppercutting Scattershot.  The two 
Alliance members were thrown into CR chamber by the Oblitercons, the CR 
chambers beginning to repair the two bots.

Dark One, Breakdown, Pyro, Hiss, and Scavenger headed for the bridge of the 
ship, fully recharged and repaired.
